alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; La Salle; Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 7:40PM CDT until July 14 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern La Salle County in north central Illinois... Southeastern Lee County in north central Illinois... Southern De Kalb County in north central Illinois... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sublette, or near Mendota, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 730 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported tree damage in southwestern Lee county with this storm! IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Sandwich, Mendota, Sheridan, Shabbona, Lake Holiday, Hinckley, Somonauk, Earlville, Waterman, Serena, Leland, Paw Paw, Millington, Lee, Compton, Troy Grove, West Brooklyn, Triumph, Harding and Prairie Center. Including the following interstate... I-39 between mile markers 65 and 89. This includes... Sandwich Fairgrounds and Tri-County Fairgrounds. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
